resources.string: Followings are the services we support. Please personalize yourself.
When you are running in a park with headphone plugged in, this service will automatically play music for you.
When you are walking near a market, this service will remind you to wear a mask.
When you are at home in late evening without using your phone, this service will automatically switch it to dark mode.
Followings are the detected user activity and location contexts.
To process your context correctly this app needs permission to access your location and activity data. Please grant the permissions for this app to work properly.
The scenario could not be activated due to insufficient permissions.
